title: AMS Meets Red Bull Rampage With Two New Mountain Bike Grips
content:
The Red Bull Rampage is one of the freeride mountain bike world’s premier events. Now, component brand AMS has teamed up with Rampage to produce a pair of branded grips that bring the energy and verve of the Utah desert to your home mountain.   The Cero and Berm both come in black with a

The post AMS Meets Red Bull Rampage With Two New Mountain Bike Grips appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Andrew Marshall
